entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
